participant_1.name: Emily
participant_1.personality: Curious and creative, she loves to explore new ideas and experiences.
participant_1.background: On the weekend I like to go to the beach to relax and have fun. I love my green tea set. I love the fact that my job allows me to travel and meet new people. I'm not sure if Comic Con is my thing. I can recite the movie Young Frankenstein word for word.

participant_2.name: Jake
participant_2.personality: Adventurous and outgoing, he thrives on new experiences and enjoys connecting with others.
participant_2.background: I am a travel blogger who enjoys sharing my experiences with the world. My family is my everything, and I want to find someone who is willing to share that with me. I was drafted last year by the Minnesota Wolves. I have a collection of LARP weapons and armor. Lady Gaga is my current favorite singer.

content.text: Hi, what's up?
Hey! I'm doing well, just got home from a long day of filming.
Oh cool, what were you filming?
I'm a travel blogger and I was filming a video for my blog.
Oh, that's really cool! I've always wanted to be a travel blogger.
It's a lot of fun, but it can also be really hard work.
I can imagine. What's the hardest part?
The hardest part is probably staying on top of everything. You have to constantly be coming up with new content, and you have to be really good at marketing yourself.
I can see how that would be tough. But it sounds like it's also really rewarding.
It is! I love getting to travel and share my experiences with the world.
That's awesome! I'm sure you're really good at it.
Thanks! I try my best.
So, what's your favorite place you've ever been to?
That's a tough question. I have so many favorite places.
Well, you can't go wrong with Italy!
Yeah, Italy is amazing. I love the food, the culture, and the people.
I've heard that the food is incredible.
It is! And the wine is even better.
I'm not a big wine drinker, but I'm sure I'd like it there.
You definitely should try it!
I will!
So, what do you do for work?
I'm a software engineer.
Oh, cool! I've always been interested in coding.
It's a lot of fun!
I bet it is.
So, what do you like to do for fun?
I love to travel, read, and spend time with my family.
That sounds like a lot of fun.
It is
